data.name: Frog Hop - Level Editor
data.detailed_description:
Create and play custom levels in Frog Hop.

Installing this DLC will download the Tiled map editor, which can be used to create your very own levels.

DLC installation is also necessary in order to play levels created by others.
data.about_the_game:
Create and play custom levels in Frog Hop.

Installing this DLC will download the Tiled map editor, which can be used to create your very own levels.

DLC installation is also necessary in order to play levels created by others.
data.short_description: Create and play custom levels in Frog Hop.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
